hero.description: Our fieldwork focuses on sampling and analysis in local bodies of water, including **Lake Minnewaska**, **Lake Mohonk**, and other critical small aquatic ecosystems in the area. Our articles below document our findings, methodologies, and progress.

featuredSection.title: Featured Research
